edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.Assignment2

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.Assignment2.Game

  • public class Game
extends Object
    Author:
    David Scianni. This is the Game class, which contains the main method of the Blackjack game. This class controls all the game-play aspects of the Blackjack program.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static Deck deck
      deck is the Deck that the Game class will use to distribute cards to each Character.
      private static House house
      house is the House that will be playing against the user.
      private static Player user
      user is the Player that the person playing the game will control.

      Game()

      static void main(String[] args)
      main contains the game-play aspects of the game Blackjack.

    • Field Detail

      • deck

        private static Deck deck
        deck is the Deck that the Game class will use to distribute cards to each Character.

      • user

        private static Player user
        user is the Player that the person playing the game will control.

      • house

        private static House house
        house is the House that will be playing against the user. All of house's actions are determined by the code in main.
